The very first step is to load your data into the R environment in the format of one or several *data.frame* objects.

Using the `prop_missing_weights` function, you can quickly check what percentage of missingness is present in your data.

```{r}

library(metasnf)

abcd_anxiety

abcd_depress

abcd_cort_t

abcd_cort_sa

abcd_subc_v

abcd_income

abcd_pubertal

abcd_colour

```
